titleStmt.title: ON A LATE DISTURBANCE IN THE THEATRE
titleStmt.author: Rebekah Carmichael (later Hay)

bibl.title: ON A LATE DISTURBANCE IN THE THEATRE
bibl.author: Rebekah Carmichael (later Hay)

front.head: ON A LATE DISTURBANCE IN THE THEATRE

lg.l: When was utter'd by Fennell, around
The lawyers appear, with their eyes on the ground;
Each knew his own heart, and in anger did cry,
I will be revenged, for by God it is I.
Then, to settle the matter, they met on a call,
And, convicted, agreed that it must be them all!
